001package com.technototes.library.subsystem.drivebase;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range;
005import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.Motor;
006import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
007
008/** Class for mecanum/xdrive drivebases
009 * @author Alex Stedman
010 * @param <T> The motor type for the subsystem
011 */
012public class MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends DrivebaseSubsystem<T> {
013
014    /** Drive motors
015     *
016     */
017    public Motor<T> flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor;
018
019    /** Create mecanum drivebase
020     *
021     * @param flMotor The front left motor for the drivebase
022     * @param frMotor The front right motor for the drivebase
023     * @param rlMotor The rear left motor for the drivebase
024     * @param rrMotor The rear right motor for the drivebase
025     */
026    public MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem(
027        Motor<T> flMotor,
028        Motor<T> frMotor,
029        Motor<T> rlMotor,
030        Motor<T> rrMotor
031    ) {
032        super(flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor);
033        this.flMotor = flMotor;
034        this.frMotor = frMotor;
035        this.rlMotor = rlMotor;
036        this.rrMotor = rrMotor;
037    }
038
039    /** Create mecanum drivebase
040     *
041     * @param gyro The gyro supplier
042     * @param flMotor The front left motor for the drivebase
043     * @param frMotor The front right motor for the drivebase
044     * @param rlMotor The rear left motor for the drivebase
045     * @param rrMotor The rear right motor for the drivebase
046     */
047    public MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem(
048        DoubleSupplier gyro,
049        Motor<T> flMotor,
050        Motor<T> frMotor,
051        Motor<T> rlMotor,
052        Motor<T> rrMotor
053    ) {
054        super(gyro, flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor);
055        this.flMotor = flMotor;
056        this.frMotor = frMotor;
057        this.rlMotor = rlMotor;
058        this.rrMotor = rrMotor;
059    }
060
061    public void joystickDrive(double x, double y, double rotation) {
062        joystickDriveWithGyro(x, y, rotation, 0);
063    }
064
065    public void joystickDriveWithGyro(double x, double y, double rotation, double gyroAngle) {
066        double speed = Range.clip(Math.abs(Math.hypot(x, y)), 0, 1);
067        double headingRad = Math.toRadians(gyroAngle);
068        double angle = -Math.atan2(y, x) + headingRad - Math.PI / 4;
069        drive(speed, angle, rotation);
070    }
071
072    public void drive(double speed, double angle, double rotation) {
073        double x = Math.cos(angle) * speed;
074        double y = Math.sin(angle) * speed;
075
076        double powerCompY = -(x + y);
077        double powerCompX = x - y;
078
079        speed = Range.clip(speed + Math.abs(rotation), 0, 1);
080
081        double flPower = powerCompY - powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
082        double frPower = -powerCompY - powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
083        double rlPower = powerCompY + powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
084        double rrPower = -powerCompY + powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
085
086        double scale = getScale(flPower, frPower, rlPower, rrPower);
087        scale = scale == 0 ? 0 : speed / scale;
088        scale = Math.cbrt(scale);
089        drive(flPower * scale, frPower * scale, rlPower * scale, rrPower * scale);
090    }
091
092    public void stop() {
093        drive(0, 0, 0, 0);
094    }
095
096    public void drive(double flSpeed, double frSpeed, double rlSpeed, double rrSpeed) {
097        flMotor.setSpeed(flSpeed * getSpeed());
098        frMotor.setSpeed(frSpeed * getSpeed());
099        rlMotor.setSpeed(rlSpeed * getSpeed());
100        rrMotor.setSpeed(rrSpeed * getSpeed());
101    }
102}
